text: Our purpose is to advance the renewable materials agenda and replace fossil based material. This calls for collaboration between the policy-makers and industry players, academics, and NGOs. We were therefore excited to host Frans Timmermans (Executive Vice-President in charge of the Green Deal and European Commissioner for Climate Action) at our Innovation Centre in Sickla, Sweden, where we discussed and explained how we can make renewable battery parts from a tree, with a product called Lignode. This is a concrete example of how renewable materials are, and can be, used to bring the highest possible value to society and our stakeholders. We also invited NGO's, other industry players, and academics to a roundtable for a conversation to find common ground and solutions as a path forwards. text: Making a change into more sustainable options in food packaging while keeping all of the performance can be difficult.
